EmailTemplate.name: Step 1 - Contract Signed
EmailTemplate.subject: Update From Palmetto On Your Project
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Opportunity.Contact__c},
We hope all is well. We have received your contract and are currently organizing all of the necessary documents to move your project forward.
Here is an outline for the upcoming installation process. Please call us if you have any questions.
Thank You,
Palmetto Customer Care 855-339-1831 customer.care@palmetto.com
